page.title: 01NATURAL FEATURES &INDUSTRY
page.content: BOURNE BOTTOM AND KNIGHTON HEATH Bourne Bottom is a stream which flows from the side of the Ringwood Road.It is heavily wooded on each side .The water is clear but not hygienic because rubbish such as matresses,tin cans and wheels are thrown into it. Knighton Heath ,surrounds Northbourne golf course.Some paths were man made however some were just tracks.Horses graze freely on the heath.Vegetation on heath is mainly of rough grass,low bushes and a few trees. THE MANNING HEATH ROAD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE There is a metal casting factory,the BDH chemical factory,a metal scrapyard with rusting industrial machinery and vehicles and a refuse tip. IN FRANCIS AVENUE is the MAX FACTOR COSMETICS FACTORY and BOURNEMOUTH WATER COMPANY.
